name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TweetExtract - Export Tweet from any User

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click to export tweet and post list of any X/Twitter account, save as CSV/Excel/JSON file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape and Extract tweet list of any users, Save tweet (threads / posts) list to CSV / Excel / JSON.
Save tweet thread information and all analytics data, included view count, reply count, retweet count, bookmark, favorites count, quote count.

HOW TO USE?

1. Enter a Tweet User link or User name
2. Click the start button

V1.3.1 UPDATE
- Added export posts, replies and highlights
- Extract & Save all posts/tweets and conversations.
